actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend subtitle A of title XX of the Social Security Act to fund additional projects that focus on competency-based training for personal or home care aides, and for other purposes.
short_title: Mollie Baldwin Upskilling of Personal and Home Care Aides Act

summary.text:
Mollie Baldwin Upskilling of Personal and Home Care Aides Act

This bill provides funding for the Department of Health and Human Services to award grants to states, community-based organizations, and other eligible entities to train individuals for careers as home health aides, nursing assistants, or similar direct support professionals.

titles.title: Mollie Baldwin Upskilling of Personal and Home Care Aides Act
Mollie Baldwin Upskilling of Personal and Home Care Aides Act
A bill to amend subtitle A of title XX of the Social Security Act to fund additional projects that focus on competency-based training for personal or home care aides, and for other purposes.
